name: Monster Run 3D!
description:
Have you ever thought about a brand new survival-running game with a horror character? It’s not a classic hide and seeks poppy game as usual. Enjoy this poppy playtime game and fight with the big boss scary doll at the end of the race.
You will play as poppy and try to gather as many good items as possible. Don’t let huggy and wuggy lose the game.
Download Poppy Run 3D now and enjoy this game!!!
developers: Sdragon Technology And Investment Joint Stock Company
publishers: SDRAGON TECHNOLOGY AND INVESTMENT JOINT STOCK COMPANY
